item.title: From Boss Suits to Ray-Bans, the Best Men’s Finds at the Nordstrom Anniversary Sale
item.description: Through Aug. 3, save up to 50 percent off menswear, watches, accessories, skin care, grooming products and more during the department store retailer’s pre-fall savings event.
